name: Detective Dixie and the Wishteria Revenge
name_original: Detective Dixie and the Wishteria Revenge
description:
Detective Dixie and the Wishteria Revenge is an adventure-puzzle game developed by Giant Leap Games. It came out on 10-05-2015. It was published by Giant Leap Studio.
Detective Dixie and the Wishteria Revenge is available on iOS.
